actions.text: The House agreed to the request by Mr. Lewis (CA) for special consideration: The question on the resolution was divided to allow for a separate vote on electing the House Chaplain and to permit an amendment to be offered to the remainder of the resolution.
On agreeing to that portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Donnald K. Anderson, of California, as Clerk; (2) Jack Russ, of Maryland, as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James T. Molloy, of New York, as Doorkeeper; (4) Robert V. Rota, of Pennsylvania, as Postmaster; and (5) Reverend James David Ford, of Virginia, as Chaplain.

titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.
